content.1: And the second lot came forth to Simeon,
content.2: And they had in their inheritance Beer-sheba, or Sheba, and Moladah,
content.3: And Hazar-shual, and Balah, and Azem,
content.4: And Eltolad, and Bethul, and Hormah,
content.5: And Ziklag, and Beth-marcaboth, and Hazar-susah,
content.6: And Beth-lebaoth, and Sharuhen; thirteen cities and their villages:
content.7: Ain, Remmon, and Ether, and Ashan; four cities and their villages:
content.9: Out of the portion of the children of Judah
content.10: And the third lot came up for the children of Zebulun according to their families: and the border of their inheritance was unto Sarid:
content.11: And their border went up toward the sea, and Maralah, and reached to Dabbasheth, and reached to the river that
content.12: And turned from Sarid eastward toward the sunrising unto the border of Chisloth-tabor, and then goeth out to Daberath, and goeth up to Japhia,
content.13: And from thence passeth on along on the east to Gittah-hepher, to Ittah-kazin, and goeth out to Remmon-methoar to Neah;
content.14: And the border compasseth it on the north side to Hannathon: and the outgoings thereof are in the valley of Jiphthah-el:
content.15: And Kattath, and Nahallal, and Shimron, and Idalah, and Beth-lehem: twelve cities with their villages.
content.18: And their border was toward Jezreel, and Chesulloth, and Shunem,
content.19: And Hapharaim, and Shion, and Anaharath,
content.20: And Rabbith, and Kishion, and Abez,
content.21: And Remeth, and En-gannim, and En-haddah, and Beth-pazzez;
content.22: And the coast reacheth to Tabor, and Shahazimah, and Beth-shemesh; and the outgoings of their border were at Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.
content.24: And the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.
content.25: And their border was Helkath, and Hali, and Beten, and Achshaph,
content.26: And Alammelech, and Amad, and Misheal; and reacheth to Carmel westward, and to Shihor-libnath;
content.27: And turneth toward the sunrising to Beth-dagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the valley of Jiphthah-el toward the north side of Beth-emek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,
content.28: And Hebron, and Rehob, and Hammon, and Kanah,
content.30: Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty and two cities with their villages.
content.32: The sixth lot came out to the children of Naphtali,
content.33: And their coast was from Heleph, from Allon to Zaanannim, and Adami, Nekeb, and Jabneel, unto Lakum; and the outgoings thereof were at Jordan:
content.36: And Adamah, and Ramah, and Hazor,
content.37: And Kedesh, and Edrei, and En-hazor,
content.38: And Iron, and Migdal-el, Horem, and Beth-anath, and Beth-shemesh; nineteen cities with their villages.
content.41: And the coast of their inheritance was Zorah, and Eshtaol, and Ir-shemesh,
content.42: And Shaalabbin, and Ajalon, and Jethlah,
content.43: And Elon, and Thimnathah, and Ekron,
content.44: And Eltekeh, and Gibbethon, and Baalath,
content.45: And Jehud, and Bene-berak, and Gath-rimmon,
content.46: And Me-jarkon, and Rakkon, with the border before Japho.
content.47: And the coast of the children of Dan went out
content.49: When they had made an end of dividing the land for inheritance by their coasts, the children of Israel gave an inheritance to Joshua the son of Nun among them:
content.50: According to the word of the
